alert.note: Alert for Southern Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 1:44PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Oneida County through 215 PM EDT... At 144 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Utica, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Utica, Deerfield, New York Mills, Yorkville, New Hartford, Chadwicks and Sauquoit. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 90 near 31. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for central New York.
